title: Why has my fps been lowered last days?????
body: Few days ago I had a minimum fps of 60. Now my fps has dropped to 5 fps. It's not my computer because I can run other games with 150 fps. I would like someone to tell me why is it so low. It's not because of resolution.

replies.body: You could have some bad game files, or an outdated driver that's causing frame rate issues.  I know that other games might work okay, but your drivers might not be impacted by them.  My suggestion would be to run through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure everything runs smoothly.  Let me know if this helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ymtZB4pn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-16T17:49:48.347+0000)
>
> You could have some bad game files, or an outdated driver that's causing frame rate issues.  I know that other games might work okay, but your drivers might not be impacted by them.  My suggestion would be to run through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure everything runs smoothly.  Let me know if this helps!

I've been through support mostly myself and from this reddit post https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5yyicw/anyone_got_significant_ingame_performance_drop/?ref=search_posts it seems many others are having this issue. It would be nice to get an actual answer or timetable for Riot to fix their code (which this appears to be) instead of  uninstall this, uninstall that, reinstall this, reinstall that...rinse, repeat.
